question: Your next-door neighbour likes to listen to music late at night. Because of the loud music, you often lose sleep.Write a letter to the building manager. In your letter,Describe the situationExplain the problem it is causing youOffer at least one solution.
text: I am writing this letter on the connection of my neighbour in the next room. I am living on the sixth floor of your building unit in room 606 and I am deeply disappointed and feel irritated by his loud music late at night.

Let me explain my situation I cannot sleep properly because he is playing music too loud in the late evening at first it looks seems fine for me during the afternoon on non-working days but later on he still playing loudly until at the middle of the night which I disturbed in my sleeping time. Since I have work in the next morning it affects my performance in the office.

Could you kindly impose a rule for no noisy policy until 10 in the evening onwards and whoever not following these rules he/she would pay fines and will do community service? I would appreciate it if you could look into this matter at your earliest convenience.
Looking forward to hearing from you.
